abstract.t: This document describes the Linden Lab Structured Data (LLSD)abstract type system, interface description and serializationformats. LLSD is a language-neutral facility for maintaining andtransporting structured data. It provides dynamic data features forloosely-coupled collections of software components, even instatically-typed languages. LLSD includes an abstract type system,an interface description language (LLIDL) and three canonicalserialization schemes (XML, JSON and Binary).
